title: 11 - Hidden Tendencies
description: Presents desires that a person was exposed to in previous existences. As Carl Jung shows, due to a lack of self-knowledge, we end up leaving some dark and uncared-for behaviors within us, and such behaviors can take over our actions if we are not conscious.

1.title: Hidden Tendency 1
1.data: Desire for individuality, there is a tendency towards authoritarianism, domination, and selfishness.

2.title: Hidden Tendency 2
2.data: It is the desire for associations. There is a tendency to depend excessively on others, especially family and friends, both monetarily and emotionally.

3.title: Hidden Tendency 3
3.data: It is the desire for self-expression. There is a tendency towards vanity, impatience, presumption, dispersing energies, living without concrete goals, and always seeking entertainment and parties, without much concern for tomorrow.

4.title: Hidden Tendency 4
4.data: It is the desire for work. There is a tendency to stifle your personality with an excessive amount of details, perfectionism, stubbornness, intolerance, and obstinacy.

5.title: Hidden Tendency 5
5.data: It is the desire for change and also for personal freedom. There is a tendency to live at the expense of others, abuse sex, some drugs (cigarettes and alcohol), make changes without apparent reason, and act with haste and impulsiveness.

6.title: Hidden Tendency 6
6.data: It is the desire for achievement and responsibility. There is a tendency to worry excessively about family, especially children (if any), professional duties, a tendency towards stubbornness, perfectionism, and clinging to inflexible and obstinate models.

7.title: Hidden Tendency 7
7.data: It is the desire for wisdom and knowledge. There is a tendency towards pretense, intrigue, and even alcoholism, as one often feels misunderstood and even rejected by relatives, friends, spouse, or simply acquaintances.

8.title: Hidden Tendency 8
8.data: It is the desire for materialism. There is a tendency to worry excessively about how to make money, acquire material goods, and also power.

9.title: Hidden Tendency 9
9.data: It is the desire for knowledge and universal love. There is a tendency to worry excessively about world problems, neglecting one's own feelings and those of the family.
